title: P2P Advertiser Information (response)
description: Returns information about the given advertiser ID.

advert_rates.description: Average difference of advert rate compared to the market rate over the past 30 days.

balance_available.description: Amount of funds available to sell on P2P. May be less than account balance according to deposit methods used.

basic_verification.description: Boolean value: 1 or 0, indicating whether the advertiser's identify has been verified.

blocked_until.description: If a temporary bar was placed, this is the epoch time at which it will end.

buy_completion_rate.description: The percentage of completed orders out of total orders as a buyer within the past 30 days.

buy_orders_amount.description: Buy order volume in the past 30 days.

buy_orders_count.description: The number of buy order completed within the past 30 days.

buy_time_avg.description: The average time in seconds taken to make payment as a buyer within the past 30 days.

cancel_time_avg.description: The average time in seconds taken to cancel orders as a buyer within the past 30 days.

cancels_remaining.description: The number of times the user may cancel orders before being temporarily blocked.

chat_token.description: The token to be used for authenticating the client for chat.

chat_user_id.description: The unique identifier for the chat user.

created_time.description: The epoch time that the client became an advertiser.

daily_buy.description: Total value of P2P buy transactions in the past 24 hours.

daily_buy_limit.description: Maximum allowed value of P2P buy transactions in a 24 hour period.

daily_sell.description: Total value of P2P sell transactions in the past 24 hours.

daily_sell_limit.description: Maximum allowed value of P2P sell transactions in a 24 hour period.

default_advert_description.description: Default description that can be used every time an advert is created.

favourited.description: Number of other users who have favourited this advertiser.

full_verification.description: Boolean value: 1 or 0, indicating whether the advertiser's address has been verified.

is_approved.description: The approval status of the advertiser.

is_blocked.description: Indicates that the advertiser is blocked by the current user.

is_favourite.description: Indicates that the advertiser is a favourite of the current user

is_listed.description: Indicates if the advertiser's active adverts are listed. When `0`, adverts won't be listed regardless if they are active or not.

min_balance.description: Sell ads will be hidden when your available balance or remaining daily sell limit falls beneath this value.

partner_count.description: Number of different users the advertiser has traded with since registration.

release_time_avg.description: The average time in seconds taken to release funds as a seller within the past 30 days.

sell_completion_rate.description: The percentage of completed orders out of total orders as a seller within the past 30 days.

sell_orders_amount.description: Sell order volume in the past 30 days.

sell_orders_count.description: The number of sell order orders completed within the past 30 days.

show_name.description: When `1`, the advertiser's real name will be displayed on to other users on adverts and orders.

total_completion_rate.description: The percentage of completed orders out of all orders within the past 30 days.

total_orders_count.description: The total number of orders completed since advertiser registration.

total_turnover.description: Total order volume since advertiser registration.

id.description: A per-connection unique identifier. Can be passed to the `forget` API call to unsubscribe.

msg_type.description: Action name of the request made.

req_id.description: Optional field sent in request to map to response, present only when request contains `req_id`.
